source_objects.description: Become proficient in Microsoft tools: Windows, Sharepoint, Excel, Word, Powerpoint, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, Project and more.
source_objects.title: Microsoft

items.title: Microsoft Excel - Excel from Beginner to Advanced
items.headline: Excel with this A-Z Microsoft Excel Course. Microsoft Excel 2010, 2013, 2016, Excel 2019 and Office 365
objectives_summary: Master Microsoft Excel from Beginner to Advanced
Build a solid understanding on the Basics of Microsoft Excel
Learn the most common Excel functions used in the Office

items.title: Microsoft Excel - Advanced Excel Formulas & Functions
items.headline: Master 75+ MS Excel formulas and learn data analysis with a top Microsoft Excel & business intelligence instructor
objectives_summary: Learn how to THINK like Excel, and write powerful and dynamic Excel formulas from scratch
Automate, streamline, and completely revolutionize your workflow with Excel
Master unique tips, tools and case studies that you won't find in ANY other course, guaranteed

items.title: Microsoft Excel - Data Analysis with Excel Pivot Tables
items.headline: Master Excel pivots & learn data analysis w/ advanced Excel cases from a top Excel & business intelligence instructor
objectives_summary: Take your data analysis skills from ZERO to PRO with Excel Pivot Tables
Learn how to use Pivot Tables and Pivot Charts to streamline and absolutely revolutionize your workflow in Excel
Master unique Pivot Table tips, tools and case studies that you won't find in ANY other course, guaranteed

items.title: Unlock Excel VBA and Excel Macros
items.headline: Automate Complex Tasks with Microsoft Excel VBA & Excel Macros (Real-World Projects included). Achieve More. Save time.
objectives_summary: Enhance your current Excel files & automate your work with VBA.
Master Excel VBA & Macros
Directly apply the Excel VBA example files included to your own work.

items.title: Microsoft Excel - Data Visualization, Excel Charts & Graphs
items.headline: Master 20+ Excel charts, build advanced Excel visuals & learn data analysis with a top Excel instructor (Excel 2016+)
objectives_summary: Understand WHEN, WHY, and HOW to use 20+ chart types in Excel 2016+
Learn advanced Excel tools like automated dashboards, scrolling charts, dynamic formats, and more
Master unique tips, tools and case studies that you won't find in ANY other Excel course, guaranteed

items.headline: Excel: The WHOLE Excel Mastery Series In One! From Excel Novice To VBA Programmer - Excel 2013, 2016, 2019 & Excel 365
objectives_summary: By the end of Level 1:
Master all the basics of Excel, even if you've never seen a spreadsheet before!
Build your own spreadsheets from scratch, and actually understand how they work!

items.title: Microsoft Excel - From Beginner to Expert in 6 Hours
items.headline: This Microsoft Excel class will make you a master of Microsoft Excel. The training uses Excel 2013 for Windows.
objectives_summary: Learn Microsoft Excel 2013
Learn from a Microsoft Certified Master Instructor with over 15 years of experience teaching individuals of all ability levels
From the fundamentals, to the most advanced features, this training covers everything you need to know about Excel

items.title: Master Microsoft Word Beginner to Advanced
items.headline: Master the most popular Word Processing tool, Microsoft Word. Microsoft Word 2010, Word 2013, Word 2016, Word 2019
objectives_summary: You will learn how to take full advantage of Microsoft Word
Begin with the basics of creating Microsoft Word documents
Various techniques to create dynamic layouts

items.title: Microsoft Excel: Business Intelligence w/ Power Query & DAX
items.headline: Learn advanced Excel for data analysis & business intelligence (Power Query, Power Pivot & DAX language. Excel 2013+)
objectives_summary: Get up & running with Excel's game changing data modeling & business intelligence tools
Learn how to use Power Query, Power Pivot & DAX to absolutely revolutionize your workflow in Excel
Master unique tips, tools and case studies that you won't find in ANY other course, guaranteed

items.title: Microsoft Project ALL: BEGINNER to EXPERT 10 Projects 9 PDU
items.headline: Learn MS Project all version HANDS-ON with COMPLETE real life examples BONUS 125 project files FREE PMI approved 9 PDUs
objectives_summary: Create EXPERT-LEVEL Project plans using Microsoft Project (all versions) over 10 (TEN) COMPLETE hands-on Project Exercises - progressively elaborated
Manage all your Resources inside Microsoft Project - whether it is people, money, machinery, licenses or even shared resources
Create 100s of world-class, self-updating Graphical Reports - at the click of a button

items.title: Master Microsoft Excel Macros and Excel VBA
items.headline: Project Based Course on Excel VBA (Visual Basic for Applications) and Excel Macros
objectives_summary: Learn how to automate daily routine tasks within Excel
Learn best practices when creating macros and streamline your VBA code
Determine when it's best to use the Macro Recorder versus VBA

items.title: Mastering Microsoft Teams (2020)
items.headline: Become an expert at using Microsoft Teams to chat, collaborate, and get things done
objectives_summary: Describe the role and function of Microsoft Teams
Create and manage Teams and Channels, including Private Channels, Notifications, and Tags
Identify uses for Chatbots, Connectors, Shifts, and Whiteboard

items.title: Visually Effective Excel Dashboards
items.headline: Actionable Excel Tips (Templates Included) You Can Use Right Now to Create Eye-Catching Microsoft Excel Dashboards
objectives_summary: How to approach an Excel dashboard project from idea to delivery
How to add interactivity to your Excel reports - No VBA required
Impress management with reports that make the decision-making process faster

items.title: Zero to Hero in Microsoft Excel: Complete Excel guide 2021
items.headline: A Beginner's Guide to Microsoft Excel - Learn Excel Charts, Spreadsheets, Formulas, Shortcuts, Macros and Tips & Tricks
objectives_summary: A Beginner's Guide to Microsoft Excel - Microsoft Excel, Learn Excel, Spreadsheets, Formulas, Shortcuts, Macros
Knowledge of all the essential Excel formulas
Become proficient in Excel data tools like Sorting, Filtering, Data validations and Data importing

items.title: Microsoft Access 2016 Master Class: Beginner to Advanced
items.headline: Quickly learn how Microsoft Access 2016 can make your life easier and more productive!
objectives_summary: Understand how Access is constructed and how to use the major objects within it.
Discover THREE Major Data Problems That Access Completely Resolves
Learn the parts of the Access screen
